Installing voxelDeskÂ¶

The voxelDesk package can be obtained from GitHub. Either download and extract the ZIP package from the webpage, or from the terminal type:

git clone https://github.com/voxelDesk/voxelDesk.git

Make a note of the parent directory into which the package has been saved. This will be referred to as the vxdHome directory from here on.
